settings.main_txt: Our compact DRD5S surface-mount solution brings the elegance of high-end recessed downlight systems to utility spaces and ceilings with limited plenum space.

settings.block_percentage_txt_lower: Compact enough to fit in limited plenum space, snaps into place for easy installation.
settings.block_p_txt:
Available in round, square, and linear
formats, our surface mounts snap into
place for easy installation.

settings.block_percentage_txt_lower: It delivers the pure, smooth light and elegant look of a high-end recessed downlight
settings.block_p_txt:
Equipped with an integrated driver for
clear, spot-free illumination and
smooth dimming down to 5%.

settings.block_percentage_txt_lower: With the elegance of a high-end downlight, yet compact enough for tight plenum spaces.
settings.block_p_txt:
Edgeless and ultra-thin, our surface
mounts match innovative design with
aesthetic appeal.

settings.main_txt: With cutting-edge optoelectronic design, the DRD5S delivers pure, uniform illumination that expands the possibilities of surface-mount lighting.

settings.tab_content:
Available in round and square form
factors designed to emulate our
recessed lights, when on, the
DRD5S surface mounts disappear
into ceilings.

An expansion of the brilliant design
and engineering that power our 4"
product, the larger format can fill an
entire room with clear and comfortable
illumination.

Featuring the same integrated driver
and small footprint that distinguish
our other surface mounts, this linear
area solution delivers 1500 lumens of
90+ CRI light in a unique form factor

settings.why_section_content: As designers and engineers of premium lighting solutions for more than 30 years, DMF knows that the quality of your light can profoundly enhance the quality of your life. With exquisite design and exceptional performance, DMF products ensure your home looks—and feels—luxurious.
